name: The Zenith
author: Baeksu
content: &quotWithout victory, survival is impossible.&quotIn pursuit of becoming the supreme being among all living creatures, the mad martial artist, Ma Jinwol, once turned the martial world into a sea of blood. However, after a climactic battle with the Five Masters of the World, he was sealed away. Millennia have passedâ€¦ and now, he awakens, not on Earth, but on an alien planet. Here, at the GSP, a universal combat tournament is held once every 100 years, and he prepares to face the strongest warrior
